response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects the quality, functionality, and the unique features of the product. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product can add significant value to your life or business.", "product_price": 12000}
